page.title: 08SETTLE TO CARLISLE RAILWAY
page.content: {British Rail}want to close this famous line. People all over the world have been trying to save the line from closure. They want it to stay open because it is an{historic}line. In the past when it was being built people risked their lives for the line. If it was closed down there would be 6 yrs of labour for nothing and hundreds of {lives lost}for nothing too. The line also passes through some of the most{beautiful scenery}in Britain. {Local people}use the line to{visit {relatives, go shopping}and to get to the{hospital}though this is difficult with{only four trains each day. A problem for{British Rail}is that the{Ribble Head Viaduct}needs millions of pounds spending on it to repair it. There are not enough people using the line to pay for this.
